refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the style for line drawing

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: imagesetstyle sets the style to be used by all line drawing functions (such as imageline and imagepolygon) when drawing with the special color IMG_COLOR_STYLED or lines of images with color IMG_COLOR_STYLEDBRUSHED. &return.success;

note.para: This function was added in PHP 4.0.6
